response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $15,000 by you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you today for $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let's discuss further if this offer aligns with your needs and budget.", "product_price": 12000}
